name: Berry cream
recipe: Mix flour, cocoa powder, sugar, eggs, and butter. Bake at 350째F for 30 minutes.

name: Cheesecake
recipe: Mix cream cheese, sugar, and eggs. Pour over graham cracker crust. Bake at 325째F for 45 minutes.

name: Caesar Salad
recipe: Mix romaine lettuce, croutons, Caesar dressing, Parmesan cheese, and grilled chicken.

name: Greek Salad
recipe: Mix cucumbers, tomatoes, feta cheese, olives, and red onions. Drizzle with olive oil and oregano.

name: Margherita Pizza
recipe: Top pizza dough with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and basil. Bake at 475째F for 10 minutes.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
recipe: Top pizza dough with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and pepperoni slices. Bake at 475째F for 10 minutes.

name: Tomato Soup
recipe: Simmer tomatoes, onions, garlic, and basil. Blend until smooth. Serve hot.
